attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current restrictive practice of working all week with 2 days of fun should be turned on it's head.  5 days of fun with 2 days at work.
Rockin' and rollin' and partying compulsory.
Musicians should be encouraged with EASY to obtain grants.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
